snippet.title: Dorfromantik - OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch! - Official Launch Teaser
snippet.description:
👉🏻 Nintendo eShop US - https://www.toukana.com/dorfromantik/switch-us
🎁 Nintendo eShop UK (& EU) - https://www.toukana.com/dorfromantik/switch-uk
🎨 Nintendo eShop DE - https://www.toukana.com/dorfromantik/switch-de
✨ Nintendo eShop AU (& NZ) - https://www.toukana.com/dorfromantik/switch-au

Dorformantik is now available on Nintendo Switch! The perfect game to chill out on the couch, relax and take a break form everyday life while building some cute worlds. Or take it with you on the go!

Dorformantik is also available for PC:
💛 on Steam (PC): https://www.store.steampowered.com/app/1455840/Dorfromantik/
💜 on GOG (PC): https://www.gog.com/game/dorfromantik
💙 on Gamesplanet(PC): https://www.gamesplanet.com/game/dorfromantik-steam-key--4997-1

Dorfromantik is a peaceful building strategy and puzzle game where you create a beautiful and ever-growing village landscape by placing tiles. Explore a variety of colorful biomes, discover and unlock new tiles and complete quests to fill your world with life!

Dorfromantik is developed by Toukana Interactive, we are a studio of four game design master students from Berlin, Germany. We are supported by the DE:HIVE Institute from the University of applied sciences (HTW) (https://gamedesign.htw-berlin.de/dehive/) and funded by Medienboard Berlin Brandenburg (https://www.medienboard.de/).
